com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.ahc

Class AHCBasedAccessor<K extends EntryKey>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.Loggable
      • com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.ahc.AHCBasedAccessor<K>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AHCContentDeleter, AHCContentGetter, AHCContentHeader, AHCContentPutter, AHCEntryLister

    public abstract class AHCBasedAccessor<K extends EntryKey>
extends Loggable
    Intermediate base class used by accessors that use Async HTTP Client library for HTTP Access.
